EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Event_CFPlatform_Q214.Early Bird Invite v2
EmailTemplate.subject: Plan Ahead and Save on CFSummit - Top 3 reasons to Attend
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello!
You’re just a couple of weeks left to take advantage of Early Bird Pricing <https://2014.event.cfsummit.com/register> for this year’s Cloud Foundry Summit <cfsummit.com> on June 9-11 in San Francisco. Still not sure if you’re going to make the premier event for developers and cloud operators? Here are 3 reasons to secure your spots.
- Keynotes: Featured keynote by Paul Maritz, CEO of Pivotal, James Watters, Head of Product for Cloud Foundry, and guest keynote address by Angel Diaz, VP of Cloud Labs at IBM. - Content: Over 25 content-rich sessions covering Cloud Foundry case studies, technical architecture and implementation details, operational best practices, and cloud platforms. - Networking: 3 days of community interaction and discussion with developers, cloud operators and industry thought leaders from Warner Music, IBM, Rakuten, BOSH, Piston, ActiveState and more.
There is still time to submit a topic <http://cfsummit.com/#submissions> or discussion that you would like to share with the Cloud Foundry community. Still haven’t registered yet? Secure early bird pricing today for the opportunity to share information, exchange ideas, and influence the future direction of Open Source PaaS.
Sponsorship opportunities <http://cfsummit.com/#contact-us> are still available for this premier event; please inquire if you’re interested.
Team Cloud Foundry #cfsummit
